name: Dexdrip
tagline: Android Application that collects dexcom signals over BLE and allows calibrations
body:
## DexDrip
DexDrip allows you to use your phone as a Dexcom Receiver (Wirelessly! through the magic of bluetooth!)

#### Currently there are 2 parts
* one is the [Relay](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/wixel-DexDrip) [(the wixel and bluetooth component)](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/DexDrip/blob/gh-pages/hardware_setup.md) which catches Dexcom transmissions them and then sends them out over BT

* The second part is the [Android App](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/DexDrip), this receives that data and graphs it out for you (and allows you to enter calibrations)

* Both are available and ready for you to use!


### Pictures
* ![Imgur](http://i.imgur.com/8xIdz5w.jpg)

* ![Imgur](http://i.imgur.com/c6kvzHe.jpg)

* ![Imgur](http://i.imgur.com/fled9b6.png)


### Stay Up to Date!!
Follow me on twitter @StephenIsTaken, I will let everyone know when updates happen that you should definitely download!

### ITS A WORK IN PROGGRESS
* There are some notifications
* There is no uploading
* There is very little error handling
* Im not even beginning to use the filtered data for error handling yet

### Recap:
Its in its early stages! Expect a lot of updates in the coming weeks!

# LETS DO IT!!
* [What you will need & Diagrams](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/DexDrip/blob/gh-pages/hardware_setup.md)
* [Wixel App](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/wixel-DexDrip)
* [Android App](https://github.com/StephenBlackWasAlreadyTaken/DexDrip)


# Want to help out!!??
AWESOME, let me know, put up some PRS, lets make it awesome!
